pr_title: core: copy the SchemaDescriptor when rebuilding descriptor

timeline.bodyText: wrappedMethods is never used, and this is causing the CI error.
timeline.author: zhangkun83
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -187,13 +187,15 @@ public InputStream parse(final InputStream stream) {
       wrappedMethods.add(wrapMethod(definition, wrappedMethodDescriptor));

replies.bodyText: Look like the earlier for loop should not have been deleted and should occur after serviceBuilder is created (just like before).
replies.author: ejona86
herbyderby

timeline.message:
core: copy the SchemaDescriptor when rebuilding descriptor

useMarshalledMessages works by duplicating a ServerServiceDefinition while replacing just the marshallers. It currently does not copy over the SchemaDescriptors, which breaks at least the ProtoReflectionService.

core: copy the SchemaDescriptor when rebuilding descriptor
